name: Life After Death (Life After Death)
description:
Welcome to our game! We are very happy to let you test our game made during the Game Jam! 

Description : The goal is simple, you must survive, all moves are allowed ! Improve your power on earth and try not to die in hell. Your time on earth is limited between 40 seconds and one minute. In hell the time you have to survive will be between 15 seconds and 30 seconds.
